overview: Affliction. . . Restriction. . . Satisfaction. . . Helpless and defenseless. . . they continue to yearn for more. Their minds are made vulnerable. . . . and their souls lay exposed. . . yet, something lingers on as their thirst endures. Their seducing natures will send chills down your spine. . . for you will be captivated by the ties that forever bind. . .
title: The Ties That Bind 2
